means: 赫胥黎，生物学家，Aldous的祖父

sentence.Network_en: Huxley himself was ambivalent about soma pills or their equivalent.

sentence.Network_en: Huxley was an exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution.

sentence.Network_en: The question is why neither Orwell's nor Huxley's nightmares have come to life.
sentence.Network_cn: 问题是为什么Orwell和Huxley的噩梦都没有成真.

means.word_mean: 1. English physiologist who, with Alan Hodgkin, discovered the role of potassium and sodium ions in the transmission of the nerve impulse (born in 1917)
2. English writer; grandson of Thomas Huxley who is remembered mainly for his depiction of a scientifically controlled utopia (1894-1963)
3. English biologist and a leading exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution (1825-1895)
